roleset.name: spread butter on something
roleset.note: BUTTER-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire (from butter.01-v)

role.descr: Bread, location/entity being covered in butter

example.name: All arguments
example.text: She butters her bread with Land O'Hates and it comes out of her pores.

example.name: All arguments, accidental arg2
example.text: In the agitation consequent upon this incident she butters her bread with the lard, and takes an enormous bite on the way up stairs.
example.arg: In the agitation consequent upon this incident

roleset.name: soften up by flattery, with an aim of getting something
roleset.note: BUTTER_UP-V, BUTTERING_UP-N NOTES: Added by Julia.

example.name: butter_up-v
example.text: If you rub them up the wrong way when you-1 're trying *PRO*-1 to butter them up, you won't just jeopardize your official position, you won't even know what the consequences will be.

example.name: buttering_up-n
example.text: And their buttering Him up with flattery before they asked it didn't make it any less obvious.
